channel.title: Terminology on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Terminology on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Facts Are Facts
item.description: Last week’s piece on disc rot drew a bunch of attention from a variety of media outlets, along with some online critics that weren’t convinced that discs actually rot, based on their personal experience. (I put up a response regarding that over on Twitter.) But one reader’s comment caught my attention … “Dude, I don’t think the word ‘factoid’ means what you think it does,” writer 15 Percent Faster informed us.
